metadata.title: CVE-2024-26667 on Ubuntu 18.04 FIPS Compliant (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:drm/msm/dpu: check for valid hw_pp in dpu_encoder_helper_phys_cleanup Thecommit 8b45a26f2ba9 ("drm/msm/dpu: reserve cdm blocks for writeback in caseof YUV output") introduced a smatch warning about another conditional blockin dpu_encoder_helper_phys_cleanup() which had assumed hw_pp will always bevalid which may not necessarily be true. Lets fix the other conditionalblock by making sure hw_pp is valid before dereferencing it. Patchwork:https://patchwork.freedesktop.org/patch/574878/

criterions.comment: linux-fips package in fips-updates/bionic is affected and may need fixing.
